SEARCH
Package cop4331.client

Class Seller

java.lang.Object
cop4331.client.User
cop4331.client.Seller
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Seller extends User implements Serializable
Represents a seller in the system, managing an inventory of products. Inherits from the User class.
See Also:

    • Seller

      public Seller()
      Default constructor that initializes the seller with an empty inventory.

    • Seller

      public Seller(String id, String username, String password)
      Constructs a seller with the specified ID, username, and password, and initializes an empty inventory.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier for the seller.
      username - the seller's username.
      password - the seller's password.

  • Method Details

      public Inventory getInventory()
      Retrieves the seller's inventory.
      Returns:

      Sets the seller's inventory.
      Parameters:

    • addProduct

      public void addProduct(Product product)
      Adds a product to the seller's inventory and updates financial data.
      Parameters:
      product - the product to add to the inventory.

    • updateInventory

      public void updateInventory()
      Updates the inventory and notifies all observers of any changes.

      public void viewFinancialData()
      Views the financial data, displaying revenues, costs, and profits.

      quantity - the quantity sold
